Name: Book 21

text: Look, lets leave things for a while; see what Ayan comes up with.
Name: Book 21

text: I mean, there is nothing sorted.
Name: Book 21

text: She says it will be very soon, but we know our Ayan.
Name: Book 21

text: Who isnt to say this is another Bridget Jones moment.
Name: Book 21

text: No.
Name: Book 21

text: Hamdi, dont say that.
Name: Book 21

text: I couldnt bear it.
Name: Book 21

text: We have enough on our plate as it is.
Name: Book 21

text: The next week, showed just how prudent Hamdi had been in not making a move as Ayan met up with them all and gave them all invitations including Zuleka.
Name: Book 21

text: Im having a traditional Somali wedding, no white dress or evening gowns.
Name: Book 21

text: I will wear a Guntino and you guys, as bridesmaids, will wear matching diraacs.
Name: Book 21

text: Its going to be the real authentic thing.
Name: Book 21

text: You mean me too.
Name: Book 21

text: Ayan, are you crazy.
Name: Book 21

text: You dont have to do this.
Name: Book 21

text: I know what the gossips are saying, if they see me at the wedding and as a bridesmaid.
Name: Book 21

text: Hamdi felt shocked at hearing Zulekas protests, she had no idea she knew people were already talking and speculating about what she did.
Name: Book 21

text: There will be no gossips there.
Name: Book 21

text: No one will be there that knows you, Z, nor any of you.
Name: Book 21

text: I am having a small wedding held at my home.
Name: Book 21

text: What.
Name: Book 21

text: You cant Hani, you sound just like my mother.
Name: Book 21

text: I can and I am.
Name: Book 21

text: It is what I want.
Name: Book 21

text: I couldnt bear all that pretence, all that money wasted.
Name: Book 21

text: And being on show.
Name: Book 21

text: No, I couldnt do it.
Name: Book 21

text: I just want the group of people I love to celebrate with me.
Name: Book 21

text: Hassans family cannot all travel over, only his parents, but they are organising a huge party over there for everyone they know.
Name: Book 21

text: The thought of that is enough.
Name: Book 21

text: So, you really are going to live in Dubai.
Name: Book 21

text: Yes, I really am, Z.
Name: Book 21

text: Ill miss you all, but you can come and visit.
Name: Book 21

text: They all went quiet.
Name: Book 21

text: Hamdi never thought the prospect of losing Ayan would affect her so deeply.
Name: Book 21

text: God knows what Hani thought.
Name: Book 21

text: But it was Zuleka that shocked her.
Name: Book 21

text: Tears streamed down her face.
Name: Book 21

text: I cant bear it.
Name: Book 21

text: Its like we are no more.
Name: Book 21

text: Where did it all go.
Name: Book 21

text: Hamdi, like the others comforted her and inside came to an understanding of her sadness, Ayans marriage meant even more changes.
Name: Book 21

text: And the least one ready for them was Zuleka.
Name: Book 21

text: Whats the matter with me.
Name: Book 21

text: Zuleka smiled through her tears, Im very happy for you, Ayan.
Name: Book 21

text: It is a great honour to attend you at your wedding and Ill wear whatever you want me to.
Name: Book 21

text: I hope you will be happy, but I am going to miss you more than I can say.
Name: Book 21

text: I second that.
Name: Book 21

text: And I third it, Hamdi said, which means, we are still all for one and one for all, yes.
Name: Book 21

text: They hi-fived each other and giggled like school girls.
Name: Book 21

text: Im sorry, but I have to go meet up with my cousins in Oxford Circus, wish I hadnt, we could have had one of our sessions.
Name: Book 21

text: I will keep you all updated on everything that happens.
Name: Book 21

text: Ayan waved from the doorway, now half of her previous body weight, super confident and beautifully dressed in a long loose summer dress with a pashmina scarf drifting like a cloud around her shoulders, she commanded the attention of every man in the room.
Name: Book 21

text: How things move along, Hamdi thought, then the sadness of the situation revisited her as the thought came to her: this is probably the last time we will see Ayan in AA.
Name: Book 21

text: She had to swallow hard.
Name: Book 21

text: Her feeling didnt last long.
Name: Book 21

text: A sense of pride replaced it, to think, such a nice, good person, thought of her as her friend.
Name: Book 21

text: This settled in her with a happiness that at least one of them had what she wanted.
Name: Book 21

text: Hamdi knew theyd all had their views turned upside down, otherwise why hadnt they argued against this arrangement.
Name: Book 21

text: Why did they all feel so happy for Ayan.
Name: Book 21

text: It must mean they now thought it actually possible that two good looking and successful people would want to have an arranged marriage.
Name: Book 21

text: Like her, the other two would surely see that Hassan and Ayan were the proof against misconceptions and prejudices.
Name: Book 21

text: She suspected there would be no more talk against arranged marriages.
Name: Book 21

text: Zuleka, as she was in the habit of doing today, surprised her by being the first to share these thoughts out loud.
Name: Book 21

text: So, who knew Ayan would end up marrying a stock broker living in Dubai, eh.
Name: Book 21

text: I am happy for her, but in a way, I feel like shes living my life, if only I could have been how my parents wanted me to be.
Name: Book 21

text: *** I cant believe she is getting married, Hani said as they watched Ayan getting her henna done for the nikah ceremony that would take place the next day.
Name: Book 21

text: They were all at Ayans mothers house where they would spend the night in preparation for the big day.
Name: Book 21

text: The house bulged with people; aunties, cousins and close friends, most of who came from out of town, but those who didnt had no idea who the girls were.
Name: Book 21

text: An impromptu celebration had begun amongst the gathering as they waited for their turn to have their henna done.
Name: Book 21

text: Everyone joined in, cooking, eating the spoils, and dancing to modern Somali music until the older women stepped in.
Name: Book 21

text: They turned off the music and Ayans grandmother started beating on a drum.
Name: Book 21

text: They made a semi circle and clapped their hands in rhythm to the beat.
Name: Book 21

text: Ayans aunties started the buranbuur, the traditional dance, in front of the sofa where Ayan sat with her arms and legs stretched out while the two Indian ladies painted beautiful elaborate designs on her.
Name: Book 21

text: She had been sitting still for over an hour, turning to various sides as they worked, while this went on Hani and the five other bridesmaids, Zuleka, Hamdi and three of Ayans cousins, catered to her; giving her something to drink and taking turns to feed her as the intricate patterns started to take effect; transforming her into a bride right before their eyes.
Name: Book 21

text: Hani thought Ayan looked beautiful and like her, the others felt emotional.
Name: Book 21

text: They all held it in as best they could and gave comfort to each other whenever they were out of earshot of Ayan.
Name: Book 21

text: None of them could say how she had got under their skin and claimed their love, but they knew she had and knew what a wrench it was going to be to say goodbye to her.
Name: Book 21

text: The next morning everyone woke up very early to get ready and compete for the shower.
Name: Book 21

text: The nikah ceremony would take place in the house, and the Imam, the groom and the rest of the men would make their way there after the noon prayers.
Name: Book 21

text: Around ten, the makeup artist and the hairstylist arrived and went upstairs to work on the bride.
Name: Book 21

text: Ayan looked a picture when she emerged.
Name: Book 21

text: Cameras clicked and flash bulbs made the room look like a disco.
Name: Book 21

text: Her mother adorned her in the gold jewellery that tradition dictates she must wear.
Name: Book 21

text: For Ayan, a chunky necklace and a set of bangles that her family had passed down through three generations, all would stay in her keeping.
Name: Book 21

text: You must take good care of this gold set, Ayans mother told her, God willing you too will pass them on to your daughter even as I am now.
Name: Book 21

text: Hani smiled at Hamdi and Zuleka as she saw Ayans mother take a tissue and wipe her eyes, only to receive the wrath of Ayan.
Name: Book 21

text: Otherwise you are going to make me cry.
Name: Book 21

text: Lets just get through this day with no tears, okay.
Name: Book 21

text: Mashallah, this is a good day.
Name: Book 21

text: There will be no crying, Ayans aunty entered the room and went to kiss Ayan.
Name: Book 21

text: Niece of mine, you look even better than Nura did on her wedding day, she said, referring to her daughter, And you girls have to go and get ready, she chased Hani, Hamdi, Zuleka and the other three bridesmaids from the room.
Name: Book 21

text: Once all the main players were ready they made their way into the garden for the reception.
Name: Book 21

text: Ayans parents had spent a small fortune and put a lot of thought and care into transforming their small garden.
Name: Book 21

text: They had hired a professional and he had turned the ordinary space into a fairyland.
Name: Book 21

text: Red and white roses were everywhere.
Name: Book 21

text: Soft fabrics made a canopy and a stage for the bridal party at the back of the garden.
Name: Book 21

text: Hani gasped as she saw it and at the sight of her friends in diraacs matching her own in a deep maroon.
Name: Book 21

text: The sun danced on the silky fabric as they moved.

frame.Frame: Cause change of position on a scale

Name: Book 21

text: Ayan wore a jungle green for the nikah.
Name: Book 21

text: Hani could see it was all she dreamed of; her happiness shone from her.
Name: Book 21

text: The Imam, the groom and other male relatives gathered in the living room for the reading of the al Fatiha, the opening sura from the holy Quran, invoking Gods blessing on the auspicious occasion.
Name: Book 21

text: Ayans father, who was her representative, wrote on a piece of paper the dowry that Hassan was expected to give to her as a marriage gift and handed it to the sheikh who handed it to Hassan.
Name: Book 21

text: With a few more words from the sheikh they signed the marriage contract and dispatched one of the little boys to the garden to tell the women.
Name: Book 21

text: The sound of women ululating rose up into the sky.
Name: Book 21

text: They shouted as the music began to play and the dancing commenced.
Name: Book 21

text: After a time, Ayan went for an outfit change and re-joined them wearing a Guntino, which Hani thought was the sexiest of all the traditional outfits.
Name: Book 21

text: It consisted of a full length piece of brightly coloured fabric wrapped around the body and nipped in at the waist.
Name: Book 21

text: The way that it tied around the body it resembled the Indian sari in that the arms and shoulders were half bare.
Name: Book 21

text: It looked very exotic.
Name: Book 21

text: Surely, Hani thought, back in the days before religious fundamentalism kicked in, it must have helped the sisters in Somalia break a heart or two.
Name: Book 21

text: Shortly after Ayan had changed, the announcement came that the groom was coming to greet his bride.
Name: Book 21

text: The sound of the ululation from the women following behind him let everyone know he was close.
Name: Book 21

text: This was the first time Hani, and the others would see him in person and she knew, like her they were very curious.
Name: Book 21

text: They pushed their way to the front to make sure they got a good look.
Name: Book 21

text: Tall with broad shoulders and not at all bad looking, he wore a macawiis, a long plaid kilt, with a crisp linen shirt.
Name: Book 21

text: On his way to the stage someone handed him a cup full of milk for him and his bride to drink from.
Name: Book 21

text: Hani knew their culture emerged from a pastoralists and nomadic society and milk was regarded as a sign of prosperity.
Name: Book 21

text: If you drink it on your wedding day it is said it will invoke good luck, affluence, and success.
Name: Book 21

text: She reflected that they might now live in urban cities and owned no livestock, but the tradition still continued.
Name: Book 21

text: On reaching the stage, the bridegroom took a small sip first and then Ayan followed suit.
Name: Book 21

text: As soon as theyd finished the cries of jubilation filled the air.
Name: Book 21

text: A son and a beaker full of milk.
Name: Book 21

text: A daughter and a beaker full of milk.
Name: Book 21

text: The older women shouted in unison, wishing them success and many children.
Name: Book 21

text: Laughing out loud at the merry scene Hani, Hamdi and Zuleka joined in.
Name: Book 21

text: They clapped and shouted as if from the rooftop:.
Name: Book 21

text: A son and a beaker full of milk.
Name: Book 21

text: A girl and a beaker full of milk.
Name: Book 21

text: Im having a great time.
Name: Book 21

text: Me, too.
Name: Book 21

text: I wouldnt have missed it for the world.
Name: Book 21

text: Zuleka grinned in jubilation.
Name: Book 21

text: Hani listened to Zuleka and Hamdi and she couldnt help but think that this was the most traditional of all the weddings they had been to, and yet, it was the one where they were having the most fun.
Name: Book 21

text: Ayan had taken them back to the heart of their culture and the result was amazing.
Name: Book 21

text: Everybody there was having a ball.
Name: Book 21

text: Soon it was time for the bride and her groom to leave.
Name: Book 21

text: Everyone followed them out of the house and to their car.
Name: Book 21

text: They were going to spend the night at a hotel before flying out the next day for their honeymoon in Bahrain and from there on, Ayan would go to her new home in Dubai.
Name: Book 21

text: Before she got into the car she came over to them and gave them all a kiss and hugged them.
Name: Book 21

text: Hani felt her tears on her face.
Name: Book 21

text: She couldnt say anything for fear of crying even harder than Ayan did, and that would spoil things, besides it was expected of Ayan, You guys have to promise to visit me ASAP, she said to them all.
Name: Book 21

text: Of course we will, Hamdi spoke for them all.
Name: Book 21

text: Now dont spoil your make up, its your wedding night, girl, and you have to look fly for that hubby of yours.
Name: Book 21

text: Hani laughed - one last tease for Hamdi.
Name: Book 21

text: Good luck with everything, Zuleka hugged her once more, and take care of yourself, okay.
Name: Book 21

text: Ill never forget you or what you did for me.
Name: Book 21

text: Ayan hugged her close, Everything will be all right, Z.
Name: Book 21

text: Think things through, hun.
Name: Book 21

text: With that, Ayan left them for her new life.
Name: Book 21

text: This signalled time to get the partying going and the women went back inside.
Name: Book 21

text: They planned to carry on dancing and have a good time until late into the night, but for Hani, Hamdi and Zuleka the party was over.
Name: Book 21

text: They went upstairs and changed into their ordinary, well chosen for their modesty, clothes and headed for AA.
Name: Book 21

text: They wanted to have a shisha in honour of Ayan and the times they had shared with her there.
Name: Book 21

text: Chapter Twenty Seven On the radio.
Name: Book 21

text: Driving towards the supermarket, Hani felt tense but didnt know exactly why.
Name: Book 21

text: Salims treatment of her and her sister had changed these last couple of weeks.
Name: Book 21

text: Yes, hed preached, but in a pleading way not with the dictatorial, I know better than you, attitude he usually displayed.
Name: Book 21

text: He only wanted for them, he had said, what he had found and believed to be the right way.
Name: Book 21

text: And though shed heard it a million times she knew a new depth to his sincerity.
Name: Book 21

text: Have some fun my sisters, but retain your modesty.
Name: Book 21

text: Wear western clothes, if you must, but choose wisely.
Name: Book 21

text: Some fashions are not for my beautiful girls.
Name: Book 21

text: Tears had come to her eyes at time; listening to him she had felt shame creep into her, opening up the pockets of doubt already sown by Ayans wedding and what had happened to Zuleka, which had seen her question the way she led her life.
Name: Book 21

text: But, Salims actions the morning hed left to go to Egypt on holiday last week had really set her on edge.
Name: Book 21

text: Hed looked like hed wanted to hug her, but held back.
Name: Book 21

text: His eyes had held something unfathomable then his smile had lit them with a light she had never seen before.
Name: Book 21

text: Jeans, a hoodie top and trainers, she hadnt seen him dressed like that for at least eighteen months.
Name: Book 21

text: Hed grinned at her expression of surprise and said, I dont want funny looks, you know, people thinking I am going to blow up the plane.
Name: Book 21

text: Then hed laughed sending a shiver down her spine.
Name: Book 21

text: Just before hed left, hed thrown his car keys at her, Here, enjoy, and, Hani, remember when I got cross with you, it was because I love you.
Name: Book 21

text: Oh, stop being silly.
Name: Book 21

text: She physically shook herself.
Name: Book 21

text: She would not let in the thoughts that threatened to destroy their family.
Name: Book 21

text: Leaning back she tried to relax, taking in the last of the autumn colours of those leaves still clinging to the trees lining the road she drove down.
Name: Book 21

text: She thought of her childhood when, on the way to school, her shoes would scrunch the crisp leaves and she would kick a pile of them into the air.
Name: Book 21

text: Everything had been so simple in those days.
Name: Book 21

text: She had felt safe.
Name: Book 21

text: Shed had a happy upbringing.
Name: Book 21

text: She and Salim had been very close and very naughty at times, but in an innocent way, where had that Salim gone.
Name: Book 21

text: Leaning forward she turned the radio on.
Name: Book 21

text: The beat shed heard numerous times blared out at her thumping its familiar sound through her body and lifting her mind out of the doldrums and into a zone filled with excitement.
Name: Book 21

text: Izzy on the radio.
Name: Book 21

text: The draught from the window as she wound it down whipped her face, Hey, thats my boyfriend on the radio.
Name: Book 21

text: Passersby looked at her bemused, she didnt care.
Name: Book 21

text: Jigging up and down to the music her excitement mounted.
Name: Book 21

text: The bend came out of the blue.
Name: Book 21

text: The car spun round.
Name: Book 21

text: For a moment it teetered on two wheels, but then righted itself and mounted the pavement.
Name: Book 21

text: Her screams mixed with the music.
Name: Book 21

text: She fought with the wheel, and regained control.
Name: Book 21

text: Sweat poured from her as she sat bolt upright, the car now on the road and parked against the kerb.
Name: Book 21

text: Her breath came in short pants; her heart thudded in her chest.
Name: Book 21

text: Looking around she saw no one had witnessed it.
Name: Book 21

text: Those shed passed walking along hadnt reached the bend yet and no one came out of the houses.
Name: Book 21

text: A nervous giggle fuelled by the adrenalin rushing around her body resisted her attempt to stop it.
Name: Book 21

text: It took her over.
Name: Book 21

text: She quickly changed direction and headed to Izzys house.
Name: Book 21

text: The thirty-minute news update heralded the end of Izzys breakthrough moment.
Name: Book 21

text: The words spoken by the deep, serious voice of the news reader cut through her.

frame.Frame: Cause change of position on a scale

Name: Book 21

text: Her excitement stopped in an instant as if a knife had sliced it from her body.
Name: Book 21

text: Our headlines at 10am:  Police have raided a flat in North London and have uncovered a terrorist cell of major significance.
Name: Book 21

text: Among items taken from the property were:  Instruction manuals on how to make incendiary devices.
Name: Book 21

text: Equipments and chemicals used in the construction of bombs, suicide vests and computers.
Name: Book 21

text: A category one security alert is in place for the next twenty four hours whilst investigations continue.
Name: Book 21

text: There are a number of people held under the terrorist act.
Name: Book 21

text: The Counter Terrorist Force, have issued a warning to everyone to pay attention to and report suspicious objects or activity in their area and to ring 999 immediately if they see anything untoward.
Name: Book 21

text: Hani switched off the radio.
Name: Book 21

text: Staring ahead she tried to make sense of why fear had gripped her body.
Name: Book 21

text: The broadcast had made sense of so much.
Name: Book 21

text: She rested her head on the steering wheel.
Name: Book 21

text: Please, Allah, dont let Salim be involved.
Name: Book 21

text: Please let him have really gone on holiday.
Name: Book 21

text: Fumbling in her bag she took out her mobile and selected his number.
Name: Book 21

text: This is Salim, leave me a message.
Name: Book 21

text: She turned the car round.
Name: Book 21

text: Hooyo, what is it.
Name: Book 21

text: Hanis mothers wailing had penetrated the walls of the house and greeted her the moment shed stepped out of the car.
Name: Book 21

text: Her heart, already heavy gave her the feeling of carrying the world inside her.
Name: Book 21

text: Taking the sheets of paper her mother offered her, she recognised Salims handwriting:.
Name: Book 21

text: My dear family, I should have found the courage to tell you myself, but I didnt so I am writing this letter.
Name: Book 21

text: I have had to follow my heart and in doing that I am in danger of breaking yours, but I have no choice.
Name: Book 21

text: Allah has called me.
Name: Book 21

text: He has honoured me by having Al Shabaab, the group fighting for freedom in our beloved Somalia, accept me.
Name: Book 21

text: My leaving you was not to go on holiday, but I cannot give you my true destination.
Name: Book 21

text: We may never meet up again here on earth, unless the cause triumphs whilst I am still alive, but before then, if those who wish it of me direct me to give my life; I will have no hesitation in doing so.
Name: Book 21

text: I have transferred the money left from fathers will and my own savings into a bank in your name, Hani.
Name: Book 21

text: You will receive details of this very soon.
Name: Book 21

text: Live a good life, my sisters.
Name: Book 21

text: I wish I could be there to help with your marriages, but it is impossible.
Name: Book 21

text: You have to think of me as gone.
Name: Book 21

text: I could not go without explaining and as you, too are good Muslims you will understand.
Name: Book 21

text: I must play my part in helping our country return to being under the guidance of good.
Name: Book 21

text: The evil transitional government must go.
Name: Book 21

text: May Allah bless you and take care of you for me, my dear Hooyo, Hani, and Luul.
Name: Book 21

text: You remain with me forever.
Name: Book 21

text: All blessings and everything you wish for yourselves.
Name: Book 21

text: Pray for me as I will for you, Salim.
Name: Book 21

text: Relief gave way to despair, and then to anger before settling in extreme horror.
Name: Book 21

text: I did not know you.
Name: Book 21

text: But as she thought this, she knew she had known.
Name: Book 21

text: Deep down, she had known.
Name: Book 21

text: Her eyes glazed with un-shed tears.
Name: Book 21

text: A hollow space opened up inside her, from it she wanted to scream and scream, but the noise of her mothers distress stopped her.
Name: Book 21

text: Taking her mother into her arms they rocked together.
Name: Book 21

text: She did not try to stop her mothers wails; only quieten them in case they alerted the neighbours to something amiss.
Name: Book 21

text: Hooyo, hush, my poor, hooyo, it will be okay.
Name: Book 21

text: One day we will see him again.
Name: Book 21

text: He has to do what his heart tells him to.
Name: Book 21

text: As she said this she realised that was exactly what she was doing in her life and the consequences could bring just as much pain down on to her mother.
Name: Book 21

text: Joining an extremists group.
Name: Book 21

text: The enormity of what it all meant smacked her in the chest.
Name: Book 21

text: She held her mother closer and closed her eyes.
Name: Book 21

text: A strength borne of her mothers vulnerability and that of Luuls came into her.
Name: Book 21

text: She had to cope.
Name: Book 21

text: She had to take care of them.
Name: Book 21

text: *** I am so sorry, baby Izzy held her close.
Name: Book 21

text: For a good few minutes she stayed in his arms unable to speak.
Name: Book 21

text: At home she had to put on a brave face and remained optimistic so as to reassure her mother and sister, but it felt good to have someone to listen to her own deep concerns.
Name: Book 21

text: I just dont know how he could do such thing.
Name: Book 21

text: I feel like someone brainwashed him.
Name: Book 21

text: I should have talked to him when I saw the changes in his attitude instead of just arguing with him.
Name: Book 21

text: Her emotions still swung like a pendulum, from anger at Salim, to blaming herself, to confusion.
Name: Book 21

text: From what you have said about your brother in the past, he sounded like an intelligent guy so I am sure no one got at him.
Name: Book 21

text: These decisions were his own based on what he had come to believe.
Name: Book 21

text: You could have done nothing about it so dont blame yourself, okay.
Name: Book 21

text: I guess.
Name: Book 21

text: This is exactly why I have beef with religion.
Name: Book 21

text: It controls and messes people up.
Name: Book 21

text: The amounts of crazy shit people do in the name of it boggles the mind.
Name: Book 21

text: Stop making random generalizations.
Name: Book 21

text: she shouted, you dont know anything about religion or what motivates people to act to defend their views, so stop talking as if youre an expert.
Name: Book 21

text: His words had provoked what she hadnt wanted to think about:  She didnt want Salim thought of as one of those religious loonies that beheaded people and posted the video clip on YouTube.
Name: Book 21

text: I know it causes more problems than it solves.
Name: Book 21

text: Izzy replied, look at how many people are ready to kill in the name of God.
Name: Book 21

text: Total bullshit if you ask me.
Name: Book 21

text: Well, Im not asking you.
Name: Book 21

text: Anyway, I have to go back home.
Name: Book 21

text: Ill talk to you later.
Name: Book 21

text: He pulled her closer.
Name: Book 21

text: No, stay a little bit longer, I havent seen you for over a week with all this shit going down.
Name: Book 21

text: I should have learned from last time how mad you get when I express my views on these things, now wasnt the right time.
Name: Book 21

text: Im not cross with you.
Name: Book 21

text: Of course you have your own opinion.
Name: Book 21

text: And one I dont think we will ever agree on, more so at the moment as it is such a sensitive subject.
Name: Book 21

text: But I cant stay.
Name: Book 21

text: My mother might need me.
Name: Book 21

text: Izzy walked her to the car and kissed her again.
Name: Book 21

text: Inside a battle of wills raged as she fought not to turn back and lose herself in his arms.
Name: Book 21

text: She clicked the fob to release the lock.
Name: Book 21

text: Her phone buzzing Hamdis tune saved the day.
Name: Book 21

text: Izzy went back inside as she answered it.
Name: Book 21

text: Hey Hamdi.
Name: Book 21

text: Hani, Ive been out of my mind with worry, why havent you returned any of my calls.
Name: Book 21

text: What is going on.
Name: Book 21

text: I am sorry.
Name: Book 21

text: Family problems, I needed to be at home.
Name: Book 21

text: Are you in some kind of shit.
Name: Book 21

text: No.
Name: Book 21

text: She told Hamdi what had gone on.
Name: Book 21

text: Chapter Thirty Two A reunion too late.

text: The winter snow disrupting the country took up a lot of the news beaming from the television screen, but still it left room for what happened in the big wide world and in particular the human disaster of the droughts in the region where her mother lived.
Name: Book 21

text: Hamdi watched the pictures projected into her living room through the shimmer of her tears:  The stick thin bodies with ribs protruding and huge sunken eyes and babies, emaciated, sucking on empty, long breasts while flies and midges crawl over their skin, allowed by hands too weak to waft them away, and yet, holding a strength to reach across the oceans to crack the hard veneer shed put up against such things happening to her mother and sister.
Name: Book 21

text: Some of her anxiety stemmed from guilt.

text: Seven months had passed since shed been to Nimos and already they were in February of a new year.

text: In all that time she had sat on the fence, angry and not accepting of her mothers plight.

text: Its one of the saddest thing to have happened to any of us.
Name: Book 21

text: One of us falling so much in love, but with the wrong guy.
Name: Book 21

text: I mean, it couldnt go anywhere, Hani.
Name: Book 21

text: You are not the kind of person to leave your family, nor could you ultimately abandon all of your values.
Name: Book 21

text: however small they maybe.
Name: Book 21

text: I tried to explain to Izzy.
Name: Book 21

text: I think he understands though he said it wouldnt stop him living in hope.
Name: Book 21

text: Once outside she linked in arms with Hamdi.
Name: Book 21

text: In her desolation she was thankful for her friends support.
Name: Book 21

text: Izzy had given her the address of where hell be staying and asked her to get in touch with him when she was ready, but that didnt make her feel better.
Name: Book 21

text: A break up was a break up.
Name: Book 21

text: He loved her now, but the memory of her would grow dim with the excitement of being in a new country and meeting new people.
Name: Book 21

text: And who knew when she would be ready, or if she ever would be.
Name: Book 21

text: She still had an hour or so before she had to be at work so she was glad to have some time to compose herself.
Name: Book 21

text: Starbucks wasnt far and she managed to find a somewhere to park quite near to it.
Name: Book 21

text: Great, Ill leave you to manoeuvre the car and go in and order for us.
Name: Book 21

text: Thanks, love, Ill have a mocha with extra cream  The thought of the steaming hot, sweet drink had her hoping it would bring her some comfort and settle the wobbly feeling in her stomach, but shed hardly sat down when her phone vibrated.
Name: Book 21

text: Her heart did a flip.
Name: Book 21

text: Had Izzy changed his mind.
Name: Book 21

text: She flicked it open with eager anticipation only to find the number showing was unknown to her.
Name: Book 21

text: Hello, who is this.
Name: Book 21

text: This is WPC Clarkson, I am afraid theres been a tragedy, maam.
Name: Book 21

text: Are you a relative of Zuleka Abdi.
Name: Book 21

text: Her phone shows that the number she last dialled was yours What do you mean the last number.
Name: Book 21

text: Is she in trouble.
Name: Book 21

text: I need to know who I am speaking to first, maam I am her friend.
Name: Book 21

text: Now tell me, whats wrong.
Name: Book 21

text: Wheres Zuleka.
Name: Book 21

text: I am sorry.
Name: Book 21

text: Well, look, do you know the girls family, we need to contact them.
Name: Book 21

text: We need a formal identification before we can give out any facts about the case.
Name: Book 21

text: Hanis mouth opened, but nothing came out.
Name: Book 21

text: Hamdi jumped off her stool and took the phone from her.
Name: Book 21

text: Hello, who is this.
Name: Book 21

text: Hani recovered enough to pull Hamdi closer to her and have the phone between them so they could both hear.
Name: Book 21

text: The voice came again, but as if from a long distance.
Name: Book 21

text: I am WPC Clarkson, are you with the girl who just phoned, what are your names.
Name: Book 21

text: Why, why do you want to know them.
Name: Book 21

text: Hani forced herself to stay calm and listen but her stomach twisted in a knot and her mind would not give her the truth of what she knew.
Name: Book 21

text: Everyone and everything around her stood still and yet went in and out of her vision.
Name: Book 21

text: The voice carried on, There has been a serious incident, and we need to contact the family of the girl we believe to be your friend, Zuleka Abdi.
Name: Book 21

text: Isis she hurt where is she.
Name: Book 21

text: Please try to understand, I cannot give information over the phone, I need identification from the family to establish that the girl here is your friend.
Name: Book 21

text: You say here, are you in her apartment.
Name: Book 21

text: Yes, we are Were on our way No, dont do that.
Name: Book 21

text: This is a crime scene and you cannot enter.
Name: Book 21

text: If you will not tell us where her family is, we will have to follow up other enquiries Is is she dead.
Name: Book 21

text: I cannot tell you anymore until we have a formal identification.
Name: Book 21

text: Please give me the address of her family.
Name: Book 21

text: Hamdi gave the address.
Name: Book 21

text: Thank you, now I need both of your details, please.
Name: Book 21

text: You may be required to make statements.
Name: Book 21

text: Hamdi answered all the WPCs questions.
Name: Book 21

text: When shed finished the WPC said, Well be in touch, thank you.
Name: Book 21

text: The phone went dead Oh, my God.
Name: Book 21

text: No We have to go.
Name: Book 21

text: We have to But she said it was a crime scene.
Name: Book 21

text: She said we cant.
Name: Book 21

text: Oh God, Zuleka I dont care what they said, come on.
Name: Book 21

text: Hamdi raced after Hani.
Name: Book 21

text: Saw her rummage in her bag for her keys.
Name: Book 21

text: Heard the click of the locks as the remote released them, but though it all registered her mind screamed her denial at her.
Name: Book 21

text: It has to be a mistake.
Name: Book 21

text: Z cant be dead.
Name: Book 21

text: They had only seen her last night  spoke to her on the phone- she said everything was okay.
Name: Book 21

text: Please God dont let it be right.
Name: Book 21

text: It didnt make senseShe couldnt be dead.
Name: Book 21

text: In no time Zulekas apartment block in Sloane Square came into view.
Name: Book 21

text: The police cars parked outside told her she was wrong.
Name: Book 21

text: Before the car even came to a full stop, Hamdi opened the door and jumped out.
Name: Book 21

text: She pushed past the police cordons and into Zulekas apartment.
Name: Book 21

text: Forensics and plain clothed officers tried to bar her way, Maam, maam, youre not supposed to be here.
Name: Book 21

text: When she raced into the living room she saw Zuleka on the floor.
Name: Book 21

text: Her unseeing eyes stared into space, her mouth open as if she was about to exhale told her there hadnt been a mistake.
Name: Book 21

text: Zuleka, their beautiful Zuleka was dead.
Name: Book 21

text: The realization hit her in the gut with a sudden and concentrated force that buckled her knees.
Name: Book 21

text: She crouched on the floor.
Name: Book 21

text: A sharp pain tore through her stomach.
Name: Book 21

text: Everything before her blurred and shook as if a violent earthquake had struck.
Name: Book 21

text: Her distraught mind could take no more.
Name: Book 21

text: She went into the blackness that descended over her.
Name: Book 21

text: Chapter Thirty Seven A spiritual reunion.
Name: Book 21

text: She looked across the room to where Hani lay in her bed.
Name: Book 21

text: They had hardly left each other since the dreadful night of the murder.
Name: Book 21

text: Sometimes they stayed at hers, but for the last couple of days theyd been at Hanis.
Name: Book 21

text: Two weeks had passed and still the police could give no indication of when they would release her body for burial.
Name: Book 21

text: All they knew was that it had been the cleaning lady who came in twice a week who had found her in the morning and called the police.
Name: Book 21

text: The thought of fun loving Zuleka confined in a freezing box night after night added to Hamdis nightmares.
Name: Book 21

text: Riddled with guilt, her grief manifested itself physically.
Name: Book 21

text: Her body weight had dropped.
Name: Book 21

text: Her hair came away in clumps when she combed it leaving it thinned and wispy.
Name: Book 21

text: Now she knew for certain Allahs punishment knew no bounds.
Name: Book 21

text: She thought of her mother.
Name: Book 21

text: Dead - just like Zuleka.
Name: Book 21

text: No more, Allah, no more.
Name: Book 21

text: I will change, I will.
Name: Book 21

text: Her body trembled with the intensity of her resolve.
Name: Book 21

text: She hadnt realised that whilst shed had her eyes closed, Hani had woken and now stood over her.
Name: Book 21

text: Hamdi, love, maybe you will feel better after we have dealt with this.
Name: Book 21

text: You know we have to co-operate with the police.
Name: Book 21

text: Theyll get him if we help How.
Name: Book 21

text: What do we know about him.
Name: Book 21

text: We dont even know his name or where he comes from, or anything, what can we tell them.
Name: Book 21

text: Oh, I cant bear it.
Name: Book 21

text: I cant bear it, Hani.
Name: Book 21

text: The duvet felt as though it would suffocate her, she threw it off and sat on the edge of the bed.
Name: Book 21

text: Hani sat down next to her.
Name: Book 21

text: I know, but we must.
Name: Book 21

text: We have to be strong that is the only way we will get through.
Name: Book 21

text: I cant, I dont have it in me.
Name: Book 21

text: Allah has taken everything from me Not everything.
Name: Book 21

text: You have me, and Tariq, and Nimo and you have your sister She doesnt want me, Hani.
Name: Book 21

text: She has never contacted me But, she is a child.
Name: Book 21

text: You must contact her.
Name: Book 21

text: You are the adult.
Name: Book 21

text: What means does she have of contacting you, anyway.
Name: Book 21

text: She knows your phone number, but how hard is it for her to have access to a phone.
Name: Book 21

text: Hamdi, dont do this.
Name: Book 21

text: You were just getting well again, dont regress, Z wouldnt have wanted that.
Name: Book 21

text: Hanis words didnt penetrate her bewildered mind.
Name: Book 21

text: Nothing of Hanis love or the love she reminded her she had from others touched her.
Name: Book 21

text: Allah had shown his displeasure, and that would have to take priority over everything.
Name: Book 21

text: She must do her penance.
Name: Book 21

text: Stop seeing Tariq  cut him from her life with the sin shed committed with him.
Name: Book 21

text: Even Hani must go.
Name: Book 21

text: Not properly, she justified her sins to herself and tried to make her do the same.
Name: Book 21

text: But she could no longer deny her own wickedness, she must atone for it.
Name: Book 21

text: She could not do that around Hani.
Name: Book 21

text: I am leaving, Hani.
Name: Book 21

text: Dont try to contact me.
Name: Book 21

text: I will go to the police and after I have told them everything I know I am going back to Nimos.
Name: Book 21

text: She will help me.
Name: Book 21

text: She has never abandoned me, not the personified me nor the spiritual me.
Name: Book 21

text: I need to marry those two together once more.
Name: Book 21

text: I cannot do that around you.
Name: Book 21

text: Hanis shock could not have been deeper if Hamdi had said she had murdered Zuleka and was now going to murder her.
Name: Book 21

text: But she felt unable to move against Hamdis decision.

frame.Frame: Cause change of position on a scale

Name: Book 21

text: She watched her dress, then leave without saying a word.
Name: Book 21

text: Reaching for her phone she dialled Ayans number.
Name: Book 21

text: Checking her watch she realised it would be around 1pm there, a good time to catch her.
Name: Book 21

text: Choosing her words with care, she confessed her own guilt over Zulekas death to Ayan.
Name: Book 21

text: Together they cried, finding it difficult to talk.
Name: Book 21

text: But, Ayan, something almost as bad has happened to Hamdi.
Name: Book 21

text: I dont know what to do.
Name: Book 21

text: Gaining some control she told Ayan all that had transpired in Hamdis life and how that and this terrible tragedy had affected her.
Name: Book 21

text: She needs help, Ayan.
Name: Book 21

text: She could have a complete breakdown.
Name: Book 21

text: Her mental and physical state is so fragile.
Name: Book 21

text: She said she doesnt want me in her life.
Name: Book 21

text: Her sobs brought her mother to her door.
Name: Book 21

text: Oh, daughter, what is distressing you once more.
Name: Book 21

text: Im sorry, Ayan, I have to go.
Name: Book 21

text: Ayan told her she would ring later, when shed had time to speak to her husband.
Name: Book 21

text: Try not to fear too much, Hani, shed said, this is a knee jerk reaction, a panic flight.
Name: Book 21

text: Once her mind settles and she can take it all in, Hamdi will come back to you.
Name: Book 21

text: Telling her mother all that had happened released some of Hanis pain and the burden shed carried with her.
Name: Book 21

text: Her mother did not condemn, it seems you and your friends lost your way.
Name: Book 21

text: One of you has paid a tragic price.
Name: Book 21

text: I am so sorry for you, my darling Hani.
Name: Book 21

text: Hamdi is suffering too much grief for her to cope.
Name: Book 21

text: Zuleka, allowed herself to go from her parents protection.
Name: Book 21

text: If only she had listened Hooyo, dont talk like that.
Name: Book 21

text: At heart Zuleka was a good girl.
Name: Book 21

text: She cared about others.
Name: Book 21

text: She wanted to qualify as a doctor and once she did she would have given up the life she led.
Name: Book 21

text: Her parents failed her.
Name: Book 21

text: When they found out about her they gave her an impossible ultimatum.
Name: Book 21

text: She did not act according to them so they cast her out.
Name: Book 21

text: They left her to flounder.
Name: Book 21

text: Yes, inside she craved material things, but even that would have gone in time, I know it would, if only they had remained protective of her.
Name: Book 21

text: You did not abandon me when you found out about the man I love.
Name: Book 21

text: No, this is true, but things would have had to be different if your way of life had been exposed whilst Salim was still here, you know that.
Name: Book 21

text: As it is, I am aware of your love for a non-Muslim, but I did not know how you have conducted yourself, partying and dating and alcohol.
Name: Book 21

text: I am shocked, my daughter.
Name: Book 21

text: You have deceived me and, as you say Luul knew, you have set a bad example to her, too.
Name: Book 21

text: Im sorry, hooyo.
Name: Book 21

text: Please dont be angry with me.
Name: Book 21

text: It is all over, Izzy left for America.
Name: Book 21

text: From now on I will try to be a good Muslim and to make you proud.
Name: Book 21

text: I want to follow your example.
Name: Book 21

text: Drinking has never been a big thing with me and I can do without it.
Name: Book 21

text: I do forgive you, Hani.
Name: Book 21

text: But only because I know you will change and you have a good future in front of you.
Name: Book 21

text: She promised to try and she would.
Name: Book 21

text: She knew she was blessed to have a mother like hers.
Name: Book 21

text: If only Zulekas parents had a little more understanding perhaps things would have turned out differently.
Name: Book 21

text: She knew one thing.
Name: Book 21

text: If she became a mother, her daughters would never live in fear and she would never impose an identity on them.
Name: Book 21

text: They would know they could talk to her openly about their feelings and would be free to make their own choices.
Name: Book 21

text: Chapter Thirty Eight Zuleka laid to rest.
Name: Book 21

text: Ayan reunited Hani and Hamdi.
Name: Book 21

text: Hamdi clung to them both.
Name: Book 21

text: Hardly able to stand, weak from not eating or sleeping shed had to remain in her seat to do so.
Name: Book 21

text: You must forgive yourself to receive Allahs forgiveness, Hamdi I cannot, Ayan.
Name: Book 21

text: I failed Zuleka as a friend.
Name: Book 21

text: I had judged her, and then, like a hypocrite I enjoyed all the trappings that her lifestyle had to offer with none of the risk.
Name: Book 21

text: Guilt is killing me.
Name: Book 21

text: I punish my body daily but cannot rid myself of my sins.
Name: Book 21

text: You are rid of them.
Name: Book 21

text: You have changed your ways, you are about to marry a Muslim boy, who has also vowed to change.
Name: Book 21

text: Allah can ask no more of you.
Name: Book 21

text: What are you talking about.
Name: Book 21

text: I havent seen Tariq No, but we have.
Name: Book 21

text: He wants to help you to get better and he wants you as his wife.
Name: Book 21

text: He says he is ready to make everything halal.
Name: Book 21

text: But, how can we.
Name: Book 21

text: Look, you need to talk, Tariq is out of his mind, but he is willing to wait until after the funeral tomorrow.
Name: Book 21

text: He has some ideas of how he would like to go forward, but he doesnt know how you will feel about it all.
Name: Book 21

text: Oh Ayan, I just cant bear to be happy when I think of Zuleka.
Name: Book 21

text: I cant bear to think of it.
Name: Book 21

text: Why did she have to die.
Name: Book 21

text: Shes alone now.
Name: Book 21

text: She is not alone, dear.
Name: Book 21

text: From Allah we come and to him we return, Inshallah, she is in a better place.
Name: Book 21

text: But her sins, Ayan.
Name: Book 21

text: Hamdi, you are still judging her and that is not your place.
Name: Book 21

text: You know how her heart lay.
Name: Book 21

text: In the manner in which she died she would have had time to know her death was imminent.
Name: Book 21

text: I know she would have cried out to Allah and in His infinite mercy He would not have abandoned her.
Name: Book 21

text: She would have known she needed to ask for forgiveness and she would have received it.
Name: Book 21

text: How could He forgive her.
Name: Book 21

text: In order for you to heal and to take up your faith again, Hamdi, you need to believe in Allahs great capacity for forgiveness.
Name: Book 21

text: You need to trust His love for us.
Name: Book 21

text: Once you have done that, you will be accepted back into His fold and know His mercy.
Name: Book 21

text: The sincerity in Ayans words cracked the misery that tied Hamdis mind in fear and something in her loving eyes soothed her.
Name: Book 21

text: A wonderful peace descended into her heart.
Name: Book 21

text: Allah could and would forgive her.
Name: Book 21

text: He did not ask her to punish herself.
Name: Book 21

text: Just to change her ways and be sorry for her old ones.
Name: Book 21

text: Did you mean it, all that you said about Tariq.
Name: Book 21

text: And what about you, Hani.
Name: Book 21

text: Yes, it is all true.
Name: Book 21

text: We have all had to think hard about our lives and how we want to live them, Tariq feels the same.
Name: Book 21

text: Zuleka did that with the sacrifice of her life, it woke us all up.
Name: Book 21

text: Allah will credit her with that, I know He will.
Name: Book 21

text: Thats beautiful.
Name: Book 21

text: It makes Zulekas existence worthwhile.
Name: Book 21

text: We must tell her parents that No, we cannot, Hamdi.
Name: Book 21

text: At least I cannot.
Name: Book 21

text: My mother is coping well with learning how her daughter has behaved, but if anyone in the community knew, she would be devastated.
Name: Book 21

text: I have done enough harm as it is.
Name: Book 21

text: Let us just know it - the three of us - it is a fitting tribute to our friend.
Name: Book 21

text: Yes, you are right.
Name: Book 21

text: Enough people have been hurt.
Name: Book 21

text: The police had, with the act of releasing the body, effectively closed their investigations.
Name: Book 21

text: They had not caught the Sheikh, but they knew his identity and his guilt without doubt.
Name: Book 21

text: Whether they would ever be able to bring him back to face the British justice system remained an open question, and one with an almost impossible answer, other than a negative one.
Name: Book 21

text: Standing outside Zulekas house ready to go in to pay their respects the three girls held hands.
Name: Book 21

text: They walked into Zulekas home.
Name: Book 21

text: Inside, next to a beautiful picture of Zuleka stood a framed headed-letter from the university, on it they read how Zuleka had obtained a first and the condolences of her tutors.
Name: Book 21

text: Hamdi felt a sense of pride as the words sank in.
Name: Book 21

text: Yes, it was a waste, but Z had shown her family that she had not given up on the dreams they had for her.
Name: Book 21

text: She had gone it alone and succeeded.
Name: Book 21

text: The thought set a worry in her that this might consume them with remorse at their treatment of her, and she finally knew this shouldnt happen.
Name: Book 21

text: Like her, they had not made the choices for Zuleka.
Name: Book 21

text: She had made them all and gone the way she had wanted to in life.
Name: Book 21

text: None of them could have stopped her.
Name: Book 21

text: But she also knew Ayan was right and Z would have asked for forgiveness and it warmed her heart to know without doubt Allah would have given it to her.
Name: Book 21

text: They walked into the living room.
Name: Book 21

text: The family had moved the big sofas to the side and replaced them with rugs where the women sat and prayed.
Name: Book 21

text: Incense filled the room; giving it a heady aroma while suras of the dead from the holy Quran played from the stereo.
Name: Book 21

text: Zulekas mother sat in the corner, surrounded by family and friends.
Name: Book 21

text: She looked small and her face etched with grief.
Name: Book 21

text: Hamdi remembered Zuleka telling of her last encounter with her mother when her mother had told her not to come to her funeral or that of her father; cruel fate meant her words were prophesied.
Name: Book 21

text: When it was time, the house emptied as people made their way to the local mosque where Zulekas body lay; washed, clothed and ready for burial.
Name: Book 21

text: No fancy designer clothes this time Z, just a plan white cotton shroud.
Name: Book 21

text: Sitting on the womens side of the hall, they couldnt see the coffin that was placed in front of the men.
Name: Book 21

text: They sat on the carpet and waited in a trance-like state as the Imam conducting the service reminded the congregation to observe the daily prayers before it was too late and prayers were said over their own coffins.
Name: Book 21

text: As people began to supplicate for her, Hani broke down, accelerating the tears flowing over Hamdis cheeks.
Name: Book 21

text: Ayan, good, kind, strong Ayan took up the position between them and held them close to her.
Name: Book 21

text: At the end of the prayers the Imam finished with a short Dua:.
Name: Book 21

text: Forgive those of us that are alive and those of us that are dead; those of us that are present and those of us who are absent; those of us who are young and those of us who are adults; our males and our females.
Name: Book 21

text: Whomsoever You keep alive, let him live as a follower of Islam and whomsoever You cause to die, let him die a Believer.
Name: Book 21

text: As they came out into the sunshine Hamdi saw Tariq across the road looking out for her.
Name: Book 21

text: When he spotted her he came towards her.
Name: Book 21

text: She nervously adjusted her head scarf.
Name: Book 21

text: This was the first time she had worn one in his presence.
Name: Book 21

text: Are you alright, Hamdi.
Name: Book 21

text: Are you ready to talk.
Name: Book 21

text: Yes, Tariq.
Name: Book 21

text: Where can we go.
Name: Book 21

text: I have my car just along there.
Name: Book 21

text: Will you come home with me.
Name: Book 21

text: She looked at Ayan and Hani.
Name: Book 21

text: She took hold of their hands and told Tariq, If I do, you must know that you cannot touch me again until we are married.
Name: Book 21

text: Oh, so you are going to marry me.
Name: Book 21

text: Yes, I love you, but You dont have to say anymore.
Name: Book 21

text: I know how you want things and I am in full agreement.
Name: Book 21

text: But, we do have so much to discuss.
Name: Book 21

text: How about I pick you up at around seven and we go out for dinner.
Name: Book 21

text: That would be nice.
Name: Book 21

text: His eyes held hers for a long moment.
Name: Book 21

text: In them she saw a love deeper than anything shed ever thought anyone would ever feel for her.
Name: Book 21

text: Hed turned to leave, but he looked back.
Name: Book 21

text: His face held worry, I hope you know somewhere where they give big portions.
Name: Book 21

text: His laughter matched that of herself and Hani and Ayan.
Name: Book 21

text: Her two friends hugged her.
Name: Book 21

text: At last she felt ready to heal in her mind as well in her body.
Name: Book 21

text: *** At the airport two days later, Ayan promised to return for Hamdis nikah, no matter that Hamdi insisted it was just going to be a small affair.
Name: Book 21

text: And, make it soon.
Name: Book 21

text: I wont be able to fly after August for at least four months.
Name: Book 21

text: What, why.
Name: Book 21

text: Hani cut Hamdi off in mid question, Ayan, youre pregnant.
Name: Book 21

text: Oh, my God, thats wonderful.
Name: Book 21

text: You should take care.
Name: Book 21

text: Sit down Yes, and it is, and yes I am, but I do not need to sit down, I am not ill.
Name: Book 21

text: I have never felt better.
Name: Book 21

text: With her bags checked in they made their way towards the passport control.
Name: Book 21

text: The hustle and bustle, children crying and others jumping around with excitement and posh voices announcing different flights, all passed them by as they stood a moment looking at each other.
Name: Book 21

text: In other times they would have gone to AA the night before to smoke and say their goodbyes in style, but instead they had spent a quiet evening together at Hamdis drinking soft drinks.
Name: Book 21

text: You never said last night I know, Hani.
Name: Book 21

text: I thought I would wait until the last minute.
Name: Book 21

text: I didnt want you both going all gooey over me.
Name: Book 21

text: You needed me to be strong and I couldnt have done that if you were trying to protect me.
Name: Book 21

text: But, I am so happy.
Name: Book 21

text: I have never been happier.
Name: Book 21

text: I want this kind of happiness for you both.
Name: Book 21

text: And it is going to happen, too.
Name: Book 21

text: I didnt tell you something either.
Name: Book 21

text: Well, whatever it is it better not be the same news as Ayans, Hamdi.
Name: Book 21

text: No, it isnt.
Name: Book 21

text: I have already contacted Nimo and she is arranging my wedding in six weeks time Thats wonderful Yes, but I didnt say because afterwards, Tariq and I are going away.
Name: Book 21

text: We are going to help out in Somalia.
Name: Book 21

text: We are going to volunteer with Islamic Relief, they operate in Puntland and its relatively safer in that part of Somalia.
Name: Book 21

text: Oh, Hamdi, Somalia.
Name: Book 21

text: I just dont know what to say, how soon after.
Name: Book 21

text: We dont know yet, but not long You are not doing this to punish No, dont even think that.
Name: Book 21

text: It is something Tariq wants to do and when he told me, I knew it was what I wanted, too.
Name: Book 21

text: Well pass by Kenya so I can meet my sister; while I am out there I can do so much good.
Name: Book 21

text: They are crying out for someone with my organisational skills.
Name: Book 21

text: Hey, slow down.
Name: Book 21

text: I cant take all of this in.
Name: Book 21

text: I have a flight to catch you know.
Name: Book 21

text: Neither can I.
Name: Book 21

text: Hamdi, your life will change so much, but do you know what.
Name: Book 21

text: I think you are the ideal couple to do this.
Name: Book 21

text: Thank you, that means a lot to me.
Name: Book 21

text: So, see you in six weeks then.
Name: Book 21

text: I cant believe it.
Name: Book 21

text: Itll be wonderful to all be together again, but this time for a celebration.
Name: Book 21

text: And, Hani, promise me you will keep positive as I know something good will happen for you, too.
Name: Book 21

text: We all have a happy future ahead of us, I know it.
Name: Book 21

text: And that is true even of Zuleka, as we have to hold on to the fact that she is resting in a blissful place.
Name: Book 21

text: A silence followed Ayans words, but it didnt last long as she said, Lets make a pact.
Name: Book 21

text: Whenever we can we will attend each others family occasions, but in any case, we will keep in contact every week and meet up at least once each year.
Name: Book 21

text: Hamdi and Ayan said together.
Name: Book 21

text: Group hug, Ayan had no need to say this as it happened as a spontaneous reaction to them agreeing their future plans to meet up as often as they can.
Name: Book 21

text: As Hamdi and Hani walked out of the airport hand in hand Hamdi turned to Hani and said, Zulekas sister asked you about deleting the photos on her facebook account, you are going to do it arent you, Hani.
Name: Book 21

text: Yes.
Name: Book 21

text: It will be difficult as they chronicle her life as we have known her.
Name: Book 21

text: You have to do it for her, Hani.
Name: Book 21

text: Remember that night in Blue Bar when she panicked and she thought she would die there and her father would find her in those hot pants.
Name: Book 21

text: I told her that if that was the case I would change her into the jeans I was wearing and clothe her exposed body.
Name: Book 21

text: This is the same thing, shes gone and some of those pictures are in compromising places and shes not wearing the right things.
Name: Book 21

text: We dont want anyone judging her now she is not able to defend herself.
Name: Book 21

text: I will, dont worry.
Name: Book 21

text: I have it planned for tonight.
Name: Book 21

text: Oh, Hamdi, its so good to see you looking better and to know you have your life worked out.
Name: Book 21

text: I know you and Tariq will be happy.
Name: Book 21

text: Maybe you will too, Izzy is going to be best man at our wedding.
Name: Book 21

text: Hes coming back, Hani.
Name: Book 21

text: Her heart skipped a beat and brought a smile she had no control over to her lips.
Name: Book 21

text: Her eyes shone with determination.
Name: Book 21

text: Izzy was coming back.
Name: Book 21

text: I would like to thank my family and my husband, JAI: without their support and encouragement, I would not have finished this book.
Name: Book 21

text: I would also like to thank my creative writing editor, Mary Wood, who added flesh to my work and helped me mould my characters.
Name: Book 21

text: It was great to have someone who cared about the early manuscript almost as much as I did, thank you, Mary.
Name: Book 21

text: Thank you to all those people who subscribed to the blog, liked the Facebook page and kept demanding more and more chapters: I was very worried about the initial reaction the book would get, but your messages of support and appreciation helped me overcome my reservation about publishing this book.
Name: Book 21
